name: Mintplex
intro: No-code NFT smart contract deployment and community building tool
introduce: Mintplex creates all the no-code tools a creator or community manager would ever need to launch and scale an NFT project without writing any code. From IPFS, to contract, to mint and beyond, Rampp does it all. As Web3 evolves, Rampp will always be there to provide a no-code solution to break down the technical and cost barriers for those looking to explore, experiment, and build in Web3.
